data.title: Download Free PDF
data.meta_description: Samuel Beckett  - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Samuel Beckett was an Irish writer known for his works in both English and French that explored existential themes. He received the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1969 for works like Waiting for Godot that examined the destitution of modern man. Beckett lived most of his life in Paris and was involved in the French Resistance during World War 2. He wrote across multiple genres including novels, plays, poetry and radio plays until his death in 1989.
